bibl.title: Greek Biblical Papyri in the Beinecke Library.
bibl.note: 1. P. Yale I, 1 (P. Ct. YBR Inv. 419; Rahlfs 814): Genesis 14:5-8, 14:12-15 [= van Haelst 12]. Full republication. - 2. P. Yale I, 2 + II, 86 (P. Ct. YBR Inv. 415; P49): Ephesians 4:16-29, 4:31-5:13 [= van Haelst 522]. Full republication. - 3. P. Yale I, 3 (P. Ct. YBR Inv. 1543; P50): Acts 8:26-32, 10:26-31 [= van Haelst 482]. Correction of two misprints.
bibl.seg: EMMEL Stephen, Greek Biblical Papyri in the Beinecke Library.

1. P. Yale I, 1 (P. Ct. YBR Inv. 419; Rahlfs 814): Genesis 14:5-8, 14:12-15 [= van Haelst 12]. Full republication. - 2. P. Yale I, 2 + II, 86 (P. Ct. YBR Inv. 415; P49): Ephesians 4:16-29, 4:31-5:13 [= van Haelst 522]. Full republication. - 3. P. Yale I, 3 (P. Ct. YBR Inv. 1543; P50): Acts 8:26-32, 10:26-31 [= van Haelst 482]. Correction of two misprints.
